name: openclaw-manager
description: Intelligent OpenClaw (formerly ClawdBot) installation, configuration, and management assistant. Guides users through fresh installs, channel configuration (Slack, WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, iMessage, Teams, Matrix, Feishu/Lark), troubleshooting gateway issues, cron job automation, security hardening (9+ CVEs), skill/plugin management, sub-agent configuration, session management, and multi-provider model setup. If you can use Claude Code, you can use OpenClaw.
